title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar. When searching for references to the 'tmpDir' field in method 'getTempDir()', no results are selected. Build version: 200201151.
OB: When searching for references to the 'tmpDir' field in method 'getTempDir()', no results are selected in the search results.
EB: When searching for references to the 'tmpDir' field in method 'getTempDir()', you should get 3 matches in the search results.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Make sure that JDK 1.3.1 is set as the default JRE.
2. Ensure that you have the source code for 'rt.jar'.
3. Open the 'java.io.File' class.
4. Select the 'tmpDir' field in the codebase.
5. Search for references to the selected 'tmpDir' field in the 'getTempDir()' method.
